Title: Relates to requiring health care providers to provide patients with a list of ingredients contained in vaccines
Summary: Requires health care providers to provide patients with a list of ingredients contained in vaccines and information relating to vaccine safety, including medical exemptions for school age children.
LawCode: Amd ยง2166, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to requiring health care practitioners to provide patients with a list of ingredients contained in vaccines
